itemps.desc:
The Samsung Galaxy S6 is powered by 1.5GHz octa-core Samsung Exynos 7420
 processor and it comes with 3GB of RAM. The phone packs 32GB of 
internal storage cannot be expanded.
itemps.title: Samsung galaxy s6

itemps.desc: The Nokia Lumia 1520 is powered by 2.2GHz quad-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 800 processor and it comes with 2GB of RAM.
itemps.title: Nokia lumia 1520
